hacks.name: Accurate Percentage
hacks.desc: Allows for decimals in the level percentage.

hacks.name: Accurate Percentage (old)
hacks.desc: Allows for decimals in the level percentage.

hacks.name: Always Show Coins
hacks.desc: Always make coins visible, even collected one.

hacks.name: Coins on Practice
hacks.desc: Enable coin pick up in practice mode.

hacks.name: Everything Hurts
hacks.desc: Owie.

hacks.name: Force Block Type
hacks.desc: Treats all objects as if they were blocks.

hacks.name: Freeze Player
hacks.desc: Freezes player movement.

hacks.name: Hide Attempts
hacks.desc: Hides the attempt count in-game.

hacks.name: Ignore ESC
hacks.desc: Stops the ESC key from exiting a level.

hacks.name: Instant Complete
hacks.desc: Teleports the player to the end of a level, also know as the teleport hack.

hacks.name: Instant Mirror Portal
hacks.desc: Reverse portal now instantly switches.

hacks.name: Instant Respawn
hacks.desc: Instantly respawns after death.

hacks.name: Inversed Trail
hacks.desc: Inverses the trail state.

hacks.name: Jump Hack
hacks.desc: Allows for jumping in mid-air.

hacks.name: No Death Effect
hacks.desc: Removes the player death animation.

hacks.name: No Flash
hacks.desc: Disables colour flashing on spider and dash orb.

hacks.name: No Jump Rotation
hacks.desc: Disables player rotation in jump.

hacks.name: No Particles
hacks.desc: Disables resuming the particle system.

hacks.name: No Progress Bar
hacks.desc: Removes the progress bar on the level, excluding the percentage.

hacks.name: No Pulse
hacks.desc: Disables pulsing on objects.

hacks.name: No Respawn Blink
hacks.desc: Removes the player blink animation when respawning.

hacks.name: NoClip
hacks.desc: Makes the player invincible. (Safe patch.)

hacks.name: NoHitbox
hacks.desc: Disables all object hitboxes. Special objects are disabled.

hacks.name: NoSolids
hacks.desc: Disables most solid hitboxes. Special objects still work.

hacks.name: NoSpikes
hacks.desc: Ignores spike objects.

hacks.name: Practice Music Hack
hacks.desc: Plays the level's song in-sync with your position, instead of the standard practice song.

hacks.name: Practice Pulse
hacks.desc: Pulsing object will pulse in practice mode.

hacks.name: Solid Wave Trail
hacks.desc: Disables blending function on the wave trail.

hacks.name: Suicide
hacks.desc: Kills the player.

hacks.name: Trail Always Off
hacks.desc: Sets the trail to either always off.

hacks.name: Trail Always On
hacks.desc: Sets the trail to either always on.
